Ethan was reading *Either/Or*, and he made *The Seducer's Diary* his whole personality that winter break. 

"Oh," he said to Levi who was also home for a few weeks. "Well, I have two hundred pages to read today. I like to read slowly, so it'll take at least the morning through to the afternoon, but I can hang out after 4."
